title: Use image assets (not icons) for AC, Washing Machine, Refrigerator, and Electrical services

requirements.text: Ensure the Services section uses static image assets (not icon components) for the AC, Washing Machine, Refrigerator, and Electrical service cards, and that each service card renders an with an appropriate English alt text.

quotes: I want AC, washing machine, Refrigerator, electriccal I want Images not Icons

acceptanceCriteria: In the Services section (frontend/src/App.tsx), each of the four service cards displays an (not a React icon component) for AC, Washing Machine, Refrigerator, and Electrical.
Each of the four service images has an English alt attribute describing the service (e.g., "AC Service", "Washing Machine", "Refrigerator", "Electrical Service").
No lucide-react (or other icon library) components are used for these four service card visuals.

requirements.text: Add the required static image files for the AC, Washing Machine, Refrigerator, and Electrical service cards under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames referenced by the frontend so they load from /assets/generated/ at runtime.

quotes: I want AC, washing machine, Refrigerator, electriccal I want Images not Icons

acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and can be loaded directly via the browser at /assets/generated/: ac-icon.dim_256x256.png, washing-machine-icon.dim_256x256.png, refrigerator-icon.dim_256x256.png, electrical-icon.dim_256x256.png.
The four service card images render correctly in the Services grid without broken image links in both desktop and mobile layouts.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new appliance types beyond AC, Washing Machine, Refrigerator, and Electrical.
Do not change booking form fields or backend service-request logic as part of this request.

required: AC unit illustration, clean flat style, transparent background (ac-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Front-loading washing machine illustration, clean flat style, transparent background (washing-machine-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Refrigerator illustration, clean flat style, transparent background (refrigerator-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Electrical tools/bolt illustration, clean flat style, transparent background (electrical-icon.dim_256x256.png)
